meta.job_title: Vice President, Chief of Staff to the Chief Legal Officer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Shape, enable, and drive strategy and operations for Law and Policy by providing advisory support to the executive leadership team on key strategic initiatives and decisions.
Lead, guide, mentor, and foster inclusion within a diverse team, helping to create and maintain a climate of continuous growth and cooperation as a culture role model.
Act as a liaison between the Law and Policy team and other partners and stakeholders within and outside the company, ensuring strong alignment and communication.
Oversee a variety of complex legal projects, from conception to implementation, and stay updated with the latest developments in fintech regulations and laws.
Coordinate the updating and creation of corporate policies, procedures, and programs, and provide continual legal counsel and guidance on all matters.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor degree from an accredited law school and an active member in good standing of a state bar.
